body: The 20-year-old man identified as a suspect in the killing of a Brooklyn man outside a topless lounge in TriBeCa last week turned himself in to the police yesterday, the authorities said. body: It was a place of the discarded and the dead. There were no roads. There was said to be nothing green that could live. The smell could sicken at a distance of two miles. In the early years of the 20th century, the tiny island off the coast of Brooklyn was a nightmare: a dumping ground for most of the trash and animal carcasses of the teeming city.
title: All the Dead Horses, Next Door; Bittersweet Memories of the City's Island of Garbage
